name: Super Potato Bruh
description:
Super Potato Bruh is a difficult platformer that uses some elements of the bullet hell genre to create an intense platforming experience.

Potato Bruh is on a journey to save Princess Lechuga from Mr. Ladle. Play through 5 worlds while dodging tons of projectiles, flying "Beef Moocows", and more!


Every time you get near Princess Lechuga, Mr. Ladle takes her somewhere else! Encounter various foods that may get in your way, even if they don't mean to. Read about the foods in "The Pantry" and learn about them. There are currently 5 worlds... The Grasslands, The Desert, The Mountain, The Crystalline Mine, and The Void.
